body_content.explanation: a problem or situation, especially in computer programming, that only happens in extreme situations or at the highest or lowest end of a range of possible values:
examples: You may run into an edge case where your program screws up.
In engineering, it is important not to overlook the task of planning for edge cases.

body_content.explanation: an extreme or not typical example of something, that should not be considered when forming an opinion about it:
examples: They claimed that the abusive behaviour was an edge case that should not deter other internet users.
I think this company is an edge case, and most organizations will not impose such stringent working conditions.
